articles.title: Pregnant women can contribute to malaria surveillance in sub-Saharan Africa - EurekAlert
articles.description: P. falciparum infection rates in pregnant women attending their first antenatal care visit can be used to estimate the burden of malaria in children living in the community, according to a study led by the Barcelona Institute of Health (ISGlobal) and the Cent…
